label: Annotate genome
description: Calls genes and functionally annotate input contig set.

parameters.label: Contig file
parameters.desc: Input set of DNA contigs for annotation

parameters.label: Scientific Name
parameters.desc: Scientific name of genome to be annotated

parameters.label: NCBI Taxonomy ID
parameters.desc: NCBI Taxonomy identfier for this genome

parameters.label: Genetic Code
parameters.desc: Genetic code used in translation of DNA sequences

parameters.label: Output Folder
parameters.desc: Path to which the output will be written. Defaults to the directory containing the input data.

parameters.label: File Basename
parameters.desc: Basename for the generated output files. Defaults to the basename of the input data.
